Check out the sale price on this tire
Consistently rated as excellent by 225-70r14 drivers

content.body:
### Shop 225/70R14 Tire Size
225/70R14 tires are mostly used on some of the vintage and popular car models from the 70s, 80s, and 90s like the Ford Ranger, Mazda B4000, Dodge Charger, Oldsmobile Cutlass, and Pontiac GTO. 225/70R14 tires are offered in all-season, all-terrain, highway, performance, touring, and winter categories.

Popular vehicles: 
1993-1998 Ford Ranger
1998 Mazda B2500
1998 Mazda B3000
1994-1998 Mazda B4000
1966-1978 Dodge Charger
1961-1981 Oldsmobile Cutlass
1974 Pontiac GTO

All-season tires are good for those who want to use just one set of tires throughout the year as these tires provide year-round traction. So, to keep the winter and summer tire swappings away, you can consider the Hankook Kinergy ST (H735), Cooper Cobra Radial G/T
 or BFGoodrich Radial T/A [BFGoodrich Radial T/A](https://simpletire.com/brands/bfgoodrich-tires/radial-t-a) if you need a set of 225/70R14 all-season tires.

Touring tires are recognized for their durability and smooth long rides. Take a look at the  Maxxis HT-750 Bravo Series and [General Altimax RT43](https://simpletire.com/brands/general-tires/altimax-rt43) if you need a set of 225/70R14 tires that can handle a long ride.

Whether you drive a Ford Ranger, Mazda B4000, Dodge Charger, Oldsmobile Cutlass, Pontiac GTO, or something else, SimpleTire has a set of 225/70R14 tires that meet your needs at a greater price!

info.title: Did you know?
info.body: A reliable brand is the #1 ask for most drivers. Here you can shop all the most popular brands and discover new ones – all tested, ranked and rated by our customers.
